DOC.brief_summary: This study ass efficacy , safety tolerability increase dos GK Activator ( 2 ) patient type 2 diabetes whose condition optimally control one previous oral antihyperglycemic agent . After 2 week washout previous antidiabetic therapy , patient receive GK Activator ( 2 ) orally , twice day 12 week , increase dos 25mg bid 200mg bid ; dos titrate achieve target fast glucose level ( FPG ) < 100mg/dL . The anticipated time study treatment < 3 month , target sample size 100-500 individual .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Titration Study GK Activator ( 2 ) Patients With Type 2 Diabetes .
